message: Aoyagi Street is just ahead.
As I round the corner, a motorcycle nearly runs me over. I stumble and fall backward.
The bike pulls up a short distance away. I stare at the driver in a daze.
He doesn't get off,<?>
but his eyes are focused on me.
Something about those eyes sends a shiver down my spine.
The man speeds off without saying a word.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey!"
I jump up, but he's already gone.
Son of a bitch!
He nearly ran me over, and he didn't even apologize!
I mean, near misses like that aren't unusual in this part of town, but it still pisses me off.

name: 蓮
message: "Are you alright?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, barely. That was a close one."

name: 蓮
message: "I'm glad you're safe."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You and me both."
Ren's concern soothes my anger.
I'm safe. That's what matters, right?
I start back toward home.
